description: This file provides function declarations for XML parsing helpers specifically for extracting various data types from XML nodes using libxml2. It acts as a utility interface for reading unsigned and signed integers, strings, booleans, and doubles from XML nodes and properties in the context of the 'icrule' module.

methods.name: icrule_get_xml_uint64
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned 64-bit integer from an XML node, based on a property name or node value, returning a default if not found.

methods.name: icrule_get_xml_int64
methods.description: Retrieves a signed 64-bit integer from an XML node, based on a property name or node value, returning a default if not found.

methods.name: icrule_get_xml_int
methods.description: Retrieves a signed 32-bit integer from an XML node, based on a property name or node value, returning a default if not found.

methods.name: icrule_get_xml_string
methods.description: Retrieves a string value from an XML node, based on a property name or node value, caller must free the returned string.

methods.name: icrule_get_xml_bool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean value from an XML node, based on a property name or node value, returning a default if not found.

methods.name: icrule_get_xml_double
methods.description: Retrieves a double-precision floating point value from an XML node, based on a property name or node value, returning a default if not found.
